name: Shadows of Souls
description:
Run - Fight

This is an Endless Runner - Fighter game. Defeat the enemies, get upgrades with coins and prestige points, complete the levels and try to get highest score that you can in endless mode.

Power-ups

Defeat enemies and bosses to consume their stats and gather treasures.

Upgrades

Purchase upgrades and buffs to get stronger and stronger.

Prepare for an Endless Battle

Complete all the levels, unlock new characters and test your strength in endless mode.
